ygData.subject: Question about lvl 20 and lvl 21 song
ygData.msgSnippet: I am currently at lvl 20.  I do not see the used of lvl 20 song at all and I was hoping that it does what the song list say it does which is -AC and slow down
ygData.messageBody:
I am currently at lvl 20. I do not see the used of lvl 20 song at all and I
was hoping that it does what the song list say it does which is -AC and slow
down the attack rate. I do not see that when I used it against a blue. It
said that it is binding and all. could anyone tell me if they have ever had
any success with this song? Also I am very close to lvl 21 and I was
wondering if I should buy it since I am very short on PP. The lvl 21 song
is supposed to be very similar to lvl 20 right?

Thnx for the help,
Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
Hammerpaw and Samiam Syren Wind
Champions of Norrath, The Rathe
